Uses

This site runs on:

  • Eleventy (v3) — static site generator
  • JSON Feed — syndication
  • just — command runner
  • Markdown — content authoring
  • Nunjucks — templating
  • Pico CSS — lightweight CSS framework
  • Prism — syntax highlighting (build-time, no client-side JS)

The site ships zero client-side JavaScript. Light and dark modes follow your system preference.

© Tero
